roleset.name: to walk sideways,ingratiate oneself to
roleset.note: SIDLE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from sidle.01-v)

role.descr: agent, rider (use only if arg1 is present)

example.name: Old West?
example.text: Wyatt sidled his horse up to Annie's side.

example.name: Disney sense
example.text: Out past the strip malls and tract housing of western Palm Beach County,the lions have sidled up to tourists in sturdy cars since Disney Worldwas still a figment.
example.arg: Out past the strip malls and tract housing of western Palm Beach County
up to tourists in sturdy cars
since Disney World was still a figment
